basicinfo.name: Zhaocun Sun
basicinfo.description: Strive to be true to myself, regardless of external expectations.

Awards.name: First Prize in Software Competition at Sun Yat-sen University's 13th and 14th Academic and Technology Festival (Won two consecutive years)
First Prize in Guangdong Regional C/C++ Undergraduate Group of the Xth National Software Talent Design and Entrepreneurship Competition, and Third Prize in National Finals
First Prize in National Finals of Xth National College Student E-commerce Innovation and Application Competition
Outstanding Developer Award in the 201X Baidu Campus Assistant Competition
Third Prize in the 201X Guangdong Java Programmer Competition

socialExperiences.name: Joined XX Mobile Development Studio
socialExperiences.description: The only organization I joined during university, where I co-developed products like an alumni network, Dongguan Training Center App, and Light Meeting.

socialExperiences.name: Organized X Developer Meetups on Campus
socialExperiences.description: Inspired by Ruby China Conf, I organized 3 meetups in my hometown, which had a relatively weak IT atmosphere.

InternExperiences.name: Shenzhen XX Network Technology Co., Ltd.
InternExperiences.title: Frontend Developer
InternExperiences.description: Developed creative HTML5 advertising pages for WeChat, participated in cases such as Baoxibird, Taobao, and Asia Environmental Innovation Forum using the team-developed HTML5Slide framework.

InternExperiences.name: Shenzhen XXX Network Technology Co., Ltd.
InternExperiences.title: PHP Developer
InternExperiences.description: Developed a foreign trade e-commerce platform based on the OpenCart system.

ProjectExperience.name: XTips
ProjectExperience.title: Android App, Author
ProjectExperience.description: A campus assistant app for Sun Yat-sen University, offering one-click course schedule import, library search, and real-time campus updates. It has served over 7,000 students.

ProjectExperience.name: XX Skills Training Center
ProjectExperience.title: Android App / PHP Backend, Project Lead
ProjectExperience.description: Led the PHP backend development using the ThinkPHP framework to create a CMS and ad management system for the app. Also set up the Android base architecture.
